post.text: With just days to go until the election, Republicans are pulling out all the stops to try to bring Hillary down. Share this to help set the record straight and get out the facts.

comment.author: Ryan
comment.text: Comey has let his personal politics cloud his judgement. He should be removed immediately. This whole thing stinks of a personal vendetta.

replies.author: Ryan
replies.text: P.S. after this came out, my husband changes his vote from gary johnson to hillary for this very reason. The fbi should never meddle in the election ptocess and comey effectively just did that....against dept of justice protocol.
